ValidationRule.description:
ZAN required if the creator of the record is 'custom - Data Administrator'
Deactivated as part of Physician Validation changes requested by Suzanne.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(ISBLANK(MDM_SAP_ID__c),$Profile.Id="00e80000001SQMI", ( PersonMailingCountry = "US" || PersonMailingCountry = "PR" || PersonMailingCountry = "GU" || PersonMailingCountry = "VI" || PersonMailingCountry = "BM"), ( RecordTypeId = "012800000002C4g")), true, false)
